thread.title: Silver Standard to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Consolidated Financial Results August 6, 2015
thread.title_full: Silver Standard to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Consolidated Financial Results August 6, 2015

title: Silver Standard to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Consolidated Financial Results August 6, 2015
text:
Silver Standard to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Consolidated Financial Results August 6, 2015 Silver Standard Resources Inc. 7 hours ago ÓÅ± Content preferences Done 
VANCOUVER , July 7, 2015 /CNW/ - Silver Standard Resources Inc. ( SSRI ) ( SSO.TO ) announces the dates for the second quarter 2015 consolidated financial results news release and conference call. Investors, media and the public are invited to listen to the conference call. News release containing second quarter 2015 consolidated financial results: Thursday, August 6, 2015 , after markets close. Conference call and webcast: Friday, August 7, 2015 , at 11:00 a.m. EDT . Toll-free in North America : +1 (888) 429-4600 All other callers: +1 (970) 315-0481 The conference call will be archived and available at www.silverstandard.com .Audio replay will be available for one week by calling: Toll-free in North America : +1 (855) 859-2056, replay conference ID 73501025 All other callers: +1 (404) 537-3406, replay conference ID 73501025 
To receive Silver Standard's news releases by e-mail, please register using the Silver Standard website at www.silverstandard.com . 
SOURCE Silver Standard Resources Inc. View photo
